===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|や|と|yomi=o}}
From {{der|ja|ltc|sort=やと|野兔|tr={{IPAchar|/jia<sup>X</sup> tʰuo<sup>H</sup>/}}|lit=field + rabbit||hare}}.  Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} reading ''yětù'', {{etyl|nan|-}} ''iá-thò''.

The {{m|ja|兔}} character is the traditional variant of modern Japanese {{m|ja|兎}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|やと|acc=1|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

====Noun====

# a [[hare]] {{gl|[[rabbit]]-like [[animal]]}}
